Turkey's Erdogan calls for pressure on Israel to allow more aid into GazaTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan on Tuesday called for increased international pressure on Israel to ensure more humanitarian aid is allowed into Gaza, and said Ankara will increase its support during the Muslim holy month of Ramadan. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 19:05:00 GMT DFETHXC5BBKBLJO2JF2SY2COU4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkeys-erdogan-calls-Pressure-israel-allow-more-aid-into-gaza-2024-03-12/Reuters世界中东
EU clears path for 5 bln euro Ukraine military aid boostEuropean Union countries are close to a deal on a military aid fund for Ukraine that would pave the way for an injection of 5 billion euros ($5.46 billion), diplomats said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:42:10 GMT YDYQ2LUTNVPMFJCNSDA2B2SGJA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-clears-path-5-bln-euro-ukraine-military-aid-boost-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Turkey's Erdogan warns against spreading Ukraine conflict to NATO, exacerbating warTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Tuesday any steps that would exacerbate the war in Ukraine and possibly spread the conflict to NATO must be avoided, adding he would host Russian President Vladimir Putin after elections later this month. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:34:08 GMT LZ65XQQJJNKHJIIOQLD5TBPCPI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkeys-erdogan-warns-against-spreading-ukraine-conflict-nato-exacerbating-war-2024-03-12/Reuters世界中东
Missile hits apartment buildings in Kryvyi Rih, three dead, local governorA Russian missile slammed into two apartment buildings in the central Ukrainian city of Kryvyi Rih on Tuesday, killing three people and injuring at least 36, the local governor said. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:19:45 GMT 56ZEIMUXXFPPFPUY5TPM5AAEOI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/missile-hits-apartment-building-kryvyi-rih-two-dead-ukrainian-president-says-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Netanyahu says he will press forward with military campaign in RafahIsraeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Tuesday that Israel would press forward with its military campaign into Rafah in the southern Gaza Strip, amid rising international pressure. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:18:15 GMT MYOAXIG5FNOMRPDOO3AHAAWZUQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/netanyahu-says-he-will-press-forward-with-military-campaign-rafah-2024-03-12/Reuters世界中东
US, UN express concern about India's religion-based citizenship lawThe U.S. government and the United Nations on Tuesday expressed concerns about a contentious religion-based citizenship law in India, with the UN calling the legislation "fundamentally discriminatory in nature." Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:11:57 GMT UJVPM4GMSNPSTHP7RCJDF3NXQI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-un-express-concern-about-indias-religion-based-citizenship-law-2024-03-12/Kanishka Singh世界
Argentina's child poverty rate on track to hit 70%, UNICEF warnsArgentina's child poverty rate could hit 70% in the first quarter of the year unless there is a change in course, UNICEF warned in a report on Tuesday, reflecting how high inflation, weakening growth and austerity is hitting the country hard. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:11:17 GMT 53HFGY53WVMP7E6UWP6JGVFTVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/argentinas-child-poverty-rate-track-hit-70-unicef-warns-2024-03-12/Lucila Sigal世界美洲
Swiss investigate alleged Russian sanctions breach by companySwitzerland's federal prosecutor has begun an investigation into an unnamed Swiss company over a possible breach of sanctions imposed on Russia following its invasion of Ukraine. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 18:02:38 GMT T7SL3EY4NFLHVGGZHLNQBZJ34E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-investigate-alleged- Russian-sanctions-breach-by-company-2024-03-12/Reuters世界欧洲
Explainer: How the West might use Russia's frozen reservesWestern officials are edging toward confiscating some of the $300-350 billion worth of frozen Russian financial assets to help support Ukraine, but how it will be done remains highly complex given it would set a contested precedent. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 17:38:15 GMT HWC5RKFO7VMYDEOUHJ6CH5GTMQ https://www.reuters.com/world/how-west-might-use- Russias-frozen-reserves-2024-03-12/Marc Jones世界
Canada officials could not have stopped mass stabbing that killed 11, report findsCanadian prison service officials could not have prevented an inmate who was out on parole from carrying out the country's worst ever mass stabbing in which 11 people died, an official report said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 17:31:36 GMT J7CBXRNG7FL25P7UHI6OFBJ65I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-officials-could-not-have-stopped-mass-stabbing-that-killed-11-report-2024-03-12/Reuters世界美洲
Kenya pauses police deployment to Haiti after PM's resignationKenya has decided to pause its deployment of 1,000 police officers to lead an international security mission in Haiti following Prime Minister Ariel Henry's announcement that he would tender his resignation, a senior Kenyan official said on Tuesday. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 17:19:43 GMT KLKT4QHBB5JP5GJX36CNO74J2M https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/kenya-pauses-police-deployment-haiti-after-pms-resignation-2024-03-12/Reuters世界非洲
